amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds for use toward any U.S. contribution for UN peacekeeping operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds for use toward any U.S. contribution for UN peacekeeping operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paul amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 71 - 359 (Roll no. 246).
